long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unleash the Power of Online Conversations with Web and Search 3.0

Imagine being able to comment on any article, page, or website across the entire internet. With Search 3.0, you can! Our Chrome extension allows  you to leave your thoughts, insights, and feedback anywhere you browse.

Search 3.0 takes your online experience to the next level by enabling direct commenting within Google Search itself. Share your research, offer tips, or enhance search results with your knowledge—right where it matters most.

Whether you're collaborating on a project, discussing the latest news, or helping others navigate the web, Search 3.0 transforms every page into an interactive experience. Join the conversation today and make the web truly yours.
